abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32469633, pmid32470178, pmid32469297, pmid32469253, pmid32471008, pmid32471876, pmid32471894, pmid32469614, pmid32469265, pmid32469255, pmid32469283, pmid32471856, pmid32471903, pmid32471016, pmid32472454, pmid32469301, pmid32469258, pmid32470179, pmid32470167, pmid32469132, pmid32469437, pmid32472464, pmid32470164, pmid32471829, pmid32471811, pmid32471331, pmid32472347, pmid32470156, pmid32469279, pmid32469137, pmid32472231, pmid32472403
